org.sensorhub.api.sensor

Class SensorDataEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.common.Event
      • org.sensorhub.api.sensor.SensorEvent
        • org.sensorhub.api.sensor.SensorDataEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SensorDataEvent
extends SensorEvent

    Type of event generated when new data is avaible from sensors. It is immutable and carries sensor data by reference

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorDataEvent

        public SensorDataEvent(double timeStamp,
               ISensorDataInterface dataInterface,
               net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock... records)
        Constructor from list of records with their descriptor
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - time of event generation (julian time, base 1970)
        dataInterface - sensor output interface that produced the associated data
        records - arrays of records that triggered this notification
